category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA101_num_of_itemids_to_generate_per_call
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to limit the number of item IDs to be generated by Teamcenter through a single SOA call. If the number of item IDs to be generated exceeds the number specified in this option, multiple SOA calls will be performed. See TCAA Installation Guide for details. Possible values: - 0 or any negative number: all the requested item IDs are created or updated with a single SOA call. - Any positive number: each SOA call for generating item IDs will involve at most the specified number of IDs. The default value is: 10000.
